showerReviews.reviewText: Great service, good food. So there aren't showers like other truck stops. But the customer service is amazing. We've been stuck here for several hours during this cold freeze. We are not used to this cold. The lady that works here offered …

A very nice little truck stop,it's clean and staff is very friendly.It even has a Washer and Dryer for OTR drivers.Great food selection,and after hrs when Kitchen is closed, you can get pretty good frozen stuff and microwave it right …
Always Clean, staff Is friendly, food is good. Its got trucker amenities, CB, lights, GPS, you name it. Parking is easy, has air pump and vacuum.

Really wish J&H would put money into updating this station.  They could extend the sitting area out to the West by about 10 feet.  Have larger bathrooms, Update the Diesel fuel pump area as hoses seem to always be leaking.  STAFF is great and very friendly and the FOOD...WoW good!!!

showerReviews.reviewText: Where to start. I travel the country a lot and visit a lot of different truck stops. This is not a corporate truck stop so I didn't expect it to be super fancy. I was completely disgusted by the showers and bathrooms at this facility they …
showerReviews.uniqueId: The Cyclone Group Consulting (THC)_Where_to_start._I_travel_the_country_a_lot_and_vis_2 months ago

showerReviews.reviewText: Today I had the pleasure of seeing one of those rare and wonderful, and unfortunately disappearing things, the "mom and pop" truck stop. First thing I did was see that the restroom was clean and stocked with TP and soap. Secondly, I went to …

Stopped in on a Sunday afternoon.  Ate at the restaurant,  very good and great service. Parked for the night.  Seems expensive for parking.  Restroom was dirty and shower was disgusting. Store clerk seemed like she didn't want to be there. I was hoping for better,  but not the case.

showerReviews.reviewText: … some of the staff is rude (not all of them some were pretty nice). The layout for parking is terrible, and they didn’t have showers or laundry. I understand they were under renovation but they could’ve brought in one of those event shower …

… Directions Trucking Agency for truck drivers. I came for an early shower and the maintenance man continuously bothered me while I was in the shower #6 getting myself ready for the day ahead. I felt harassed and vulnerable and thought …
It's not as nice as newer pilots, but service was good. Shower very hot water and water pressure was great. Showers very clean.

We stopped at the Pilot truck stop in desperate need of a shower when we were several hours away from home and super sweaty after hiking in and out of a state park from Lake Michigan. We wanted to spend the evening in Grand Rapids on our …
The good: Free parking was available at 1600. The fuel pumps worked correctly. There food that was available was good (double cheeseburger from the hot bar). The shower I had was clean. …
Nice and clean place to stay.. xClean shower

… was more talk than work and the line was huge. Saturday we went in to shower, not sure how clean the shower actually was but my shower towel was torn on the edges and smelled of oil. Lunchtime, the hot box was completely empty as were the …

… here at this location multiple times and this is usually a great store. Not tonight. Not with these jerks operating it. I have to go now, there was 5 empty showers and they just called my number after taking half an hour to clean the shower …

… put cones blocking it. Then pull around to now wait in line for a pump just to find out the key board at pump isn't working or the app won't communicate with their server.. Pumps leak worse than any Ive used... And...Shower was almost cold.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice folks, decent place, but no toilet in shower, and no restaurant type food. Just quick stuff, but a wide selection.
Great place to park and take a shower if you’re a trucker.The staffs are very helpful and friendly

Nice staff, but very dirt feeling not a place I would choose to shower, no real food just subway , fine for a quick stop. However has very large parking area and a truck wash, that they do a so,so job in a pinch.
Nice gas station to get almost everything you might need without having to go to the grocery store. Friendly staff, nice bathrooms and if you happen to need a shower it's the place for you!

If your a team driver with your significant other and shower together, So you use 1 shower they want to charge you double what the shower actually cost, Save your time shower at the Pilot then just use this place to park if needed. Then the …
Stopped to shower very clean and provide 2 towels along with a facecloth. Staff is very courteous. Easy on and off of expressway.
What a dump shower was filthy the place is a dump period!!!!!!

showerReviews.reviewText: Today I had to pay for a shower $17.00. It's not the cost but the principal because we already fueled with them $500/$600/$700. I think Rick should've handle it better (there was no fight or even raising voice). But their district/regional …
Massive place to park. Shower clean. Many room to maneuver compared to FJ. May need more fuel pump. A little dark at the end of the parking lot
Cashier was friendly, shower had hot water, gd pressure,  my only concern is the parking lot towards the back has no lights. A little unnerving if u need to walk across in the middle of the night.

… Then there was another driver in there that was having trouble with his ultra one account on the kiosk and could not get a shower the girl refused to give him a shower even though he had the receipt showing he put 110 gallons in. I ended up …

Staff is rude, changed policy about how much fuel you need for a shower, laundry credit card machine not working properly and not posted anyplace, shower not as clean as should be, breakfast buffet only gets 1.5 stars because biscuits are …

All diesel pumps were slow if not broken, no attendant at the check out counter, dingy feel. The worst TA I've been to. The shower was nice except for the disgusting shower curtain. Very disappointed.

No showers. You can get one if you pay for it. No shower credits. 2nd TA in two days
Same thing.

Not good opened a new card at a different TA they never put my shower on after I fueled an the guy at the fuel desk made me feel like a lier when I told him about it. When my GF an I took are shower she went in to eat she ordered coffee for …
Fifteen bucks for a dirty shower and the only place I've had a lizard knock on my cab.  The parking lot is big, though.
Had 2 wait 30 minutes for a shower THEN went into shower & had to ask for TOILET PAPER & BATH TOWELS. This is the WORST TA/PETRO I HAVE EVER BEEN IN. Never parking here again

showerReviews.reviewText: Dirty shower and parking lot. trash had no been emptied, hair all over the shower. toilet was not cleaned. the employee was too busy on his phone. no dennys. ihop coming soon but for now just pizza and that stuff. only giving 2 stars cause …

Nice hot shower. Lots of parking. When trying to order pizza was told quote” now is not the time”. The deli person didn’t show up for work so no one there, not even the manager knew how to bake a pizza, obviously they just didn’t wanna make …

AWSOME SHOWER GREAT STAFF PATIENT WITH ME I HAVE DISABILITIES THANKS FOR WALKING ON

SAM'S JOURNEY

My JOURNEY PICS HALL OF FAME ENJOY MY PILOT I LOVE PILOT THANKS FOR CARING
… You can find a FedEx and UPS drop box here if you are looking to drop off a package. The facilities here are really clean and you can even take a shower if you'd like. …

… , we need the resting areas to be available to us. There are times that we have no time to use the rest room- and take a shower but when we do, “Unfortunately” it is “CLOSED”. It is unacceptable for the resting area (to take a shower) …

I work in construction and find myself on the road for two or three weeks at a time quite often so I come here from time to time to take a shower. it's a great place with great people. I've always been treated very friendly, until today. …

Really getting run down. Lack of maintenance.  All trash cans were full . Almost all showers were dirty. The shower I had was not cleaned. Just put new towels in and lifted the toilet seat. Sure has gone down hill.  Dennys has been closed …
One of the best places to shower at Flying J. They actually clean and water pressure is great. And they stay on top of cleaning the showers. Very nice shower attendants!!!
Shower was nice compared to other pilot showers, ihop was a nice change from fast food. No complaints in parking or fueling either. DD Trucker reviews

… bad reviews. I don't know about that because I don't like at any Denny's location. But, this is the cleanest truck stop shower I have ever seen in the U.S. I am Canadian and some of these places I refuse to shower but I found this location …

locations.content: Arlene's Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: 24 hour store. Diner closed Sunday. B&G were okay and home fries were undercooked, some almost raw. One shower $15. Nice little truck stop with one of those gas station chicken places inside too.
If I were a trucker, I'd love this place. Shower, fried chicken, lots of convenience items. Open 24 hours. Big back lot.
… Their facilities are clean, stocked well and their staff members are friendly. There’s a shower if you need one with your stanky a$$. …

Nice little ma and pop truck stop. $7 for a shower. Not sure if you have to pay to park. Food is fresh & homemade and very very good. Service is great. Will be back again. $8.95 for meal in picture (and 2 pieces of toast). Can’t beat it!

Great little truck stop.  The shower was pretty good for five bucks.  I'd definitely shower here again.  Food wasn't bad either.  Only complaint I have about the food was the canned carrots, otherwise, it was hot and tasted pretty decent …

… little restaurant is good and reasonably priced. You get big portions and the service is really good. The only issue I had was the cleanliness of the $10 shower. Probably won’t shower here again. Other than that, nice little place to stop …

… . It has very kind people and amazing home cooked food. It is amazing with lots of space. Not too loud and yet, you can tell the place has vigour. They even have a shower too which is amazing. And the coffee is better then the big stops.

… stop. There is paved parking lot with out holes and it doesn't get to busy. Pumps are new and work very well. Shower is older but clean, shower stall is a bit tight but enough to get the job done. Food is delicious ans priced very well.

Arlenes truck stop just honestly has a little of everything to offer! Out on the road traveling and need an affordable place to shower for just 7 dollars! Or pop over to the restaurant and get a trucker sized meal for some of the best …
Usually plenty of parking, even late at night. They are still closing at 8pm even for fuel/bathrooms, but there is a port-a-john outside. $5 shower, friendly staff. Good local spot, and quiet.
